dimension:
15 x 53 in. (38.1 x 134.62 cm) (including ties)
18 1/2 in. (46.99 cm) (object part, ties, each)
title: Woman's Frontal Apron
description: lined in dark blue with blue front band and two woven black and white ties; center blue and white rectangular batik insert surrounded on three sides by embroidery in shade of red; surrounding that is narrow blue and white border
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
